storyInfo: An Angry Zofia goes looking for Maria, trying to convince her to give up knight competition. Instead, she is convinced to become Maria's coach.

attributes.content: Maria! How is it looking?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Hold on just a little longer! Let me get this last screw!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Tighten it up! Really get it in there!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Got it! Wait, hold on! I think I know what's wrong with the battery slot connection down here—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hurry up! You know how heavy the jukebox is! I can't hold it much longer!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Your cheese, V.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...This isn't going to blow up on us like last time now, is it?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: A jukebox blowing up? That would be quite a sight to behold.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: How can you be sure it won't happen? If it's got something to do with Originium, Kowal will find a way to mess it up.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Who's talking behind my back?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Master Kowal! C-Careful! Stop shaking it!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ughh, my bad. Sorry, Maria.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: V! Once I'm done over here, I'm going to teach you a lesson!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Good, I'll be waiting!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I can always count on you two to liven things up here. Just remember, if you end up fighting, anything you break, you'll have to pay for.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You've heard him babble on and on like that for years, but when did you ever see him win?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: He handed you your behind just the other day.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ugh... I was drunk last time. Plus, I had arthritis... That didn't count!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: *Chugging intensifies*—Hah! When we made that trip to the borderlands back in the day, he wouldn't dare talk to me like this...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: V! What kind of lies are you on about this time?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You followed me to that hellhole! Who were you, if not just a retainer?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That was years ago! All of your retainers made it big enough to be your king by now!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Maria!
Eek!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uagh—! Son of a bitch! What'd you let go for?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: M-My bad... Let me hide here for a minute...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Zofia, go easy on the door. I've had to replace it more than a few times just this month.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: *Sigh*... This is exactly why I haven't forked out the money for an automatic door.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What's going on? Why are you so worked up?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You're there, aren't you?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ma-ri-a!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eeek—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hey, Maria, she's coming this way. Doesn't look like that jukebox's keeping you out of sight.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ugh... Why is this jukebox so small...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: How's she looking?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Bad. I haven't seen her this mad since that time she threw that drunken knight prick out.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: —Oh, now she's smiling.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That's even worse!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Kowal?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahem—V! Time to hit the bottle! You were talking about me behind my back, weren't you?! I'll show you I meant it when I said I could drink you under the table!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Tsk, you coward. You're just running away!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Then perhaps you should try and see if you can help Maria's case?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I-I don't even know what's going on with the two of them! I'm staying out of it!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Ma-ri-a, what are you hiding here for?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You're trying to keep something from me, aren't you? Not that I don't already know what's going on.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ha, haha...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You know what it means to enter the Major, right?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ohh... No wonder Zofia's furious.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Why didn't you come talk to me first?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Cause I knew you'd be mad, Zofia...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You bet I am! You don't have the faintest idea what you're going up against!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I-I know a little about it...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Through your sister? The Radiant Knight of Kazimierz, one of the youngest miracles to grace the Major? Yes, of course you'd know a lot about that.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But—you—aren't—Margaret!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: D-Don't pinch my ear—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But, but! The family's in really hot water right now!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'm not kidding! I may not even have a bed to sleep in come next year! We'll be out of furniture to sell!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Association doesn't recognize a noble family without a Knight Primus. I've lost track of how many times they've come to complain about that... I-I don't have any other choice...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...If it comes to that, you can come live at my place. We've got a big bath and two gardens...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: In any case, you shouldn't have signed up for the Major... That's way too rash of you...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Even before my grandfather passed, my uncle never wanted anything to do with the Association, let alone after.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And it's been a while since my sister was kicked out of Kazimierz. If I don't even try to step up here...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Even so, you should've at least talked to us... Don't just blindly chase whatever idea pops into your head.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'm really sorry... but I knew you'd stop me if I told you...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Of course I would!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...What about now?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...'The Radiant Knight appears once more? Will the debuting knight of the Nearl family restore honor to the nobles?'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The headline on today's sports page.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahaha... Margaret's as popular as ever...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is no joke!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The media may be hyping things up with their weird headlines and lies, but It's not too late to quit, I'm telling you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But if I don't do this, the Nearl family will go bankrupt and lose our status as nobles!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I know what I'm doing, Zofia... I... I have to do this.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Geez... Marcin, you know what knight sports are like. Help me out here—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah, I say let her try.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: —What!?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Marcin! Thanks!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: No, no, no. With the way she is, she wouldn't win in a fight against me even if I tied one hand behind my back! Are you sure?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What a mean thing to say!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Now, now. You made it to the Final 16 in the Major. She'd be earning more than a passing grade to take you with just one hand.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That's right. V here wouldn't even stand a chance even if you tied one hand behind your back.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You wanna say that again!?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: All of us regulars here may all be old, retired folks past our prime, but we still got an eye for people, and we know what potential looks like... creepy old men that we are... Eh, she'll do fine.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That's no way to talk! That's not even a compliment!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You know what I'm talking about! Don't tell me you knights don't get sick of talking like a walking encyclopedia!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ahem—V is right.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I trust Maria's talent. Her Arts and swordsmanship isn't bad at all. You of all people should know. You've been practicing with her since she was just a kid.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But she's been so into mechanical work these last few years. I thought she wanted to become a mechanic...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That's just a hobby. I don't want to give it up... but you've got to do what you've got to do, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ow!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...I still haven't forgiven you for making that decision on your own. This really isn't a joke.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...I agree with Zofia on that.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I admire you doing everything you can for your family, and with a smile on your face, but knight sports aren't all fun and games like they are for tourists and the crowd.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: In fact, you'll find there's nothing fun about it.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin lifts his hand up—Much of his arm has been replaced with robotic parts. The joint rattles metallically.
Oh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is what happens if you let your guard down.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Yeah... I remember that. You were up against a Victorian with two blades.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You still won, in the end.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Yes, but at what price?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: This is the kind of glory you get in the Major. Now even cleaning a wine glass is a chore.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The Major, hmph.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: There's no mercy or respect in the arena. The only thing real there is the blood that splatters the ground.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: The audience cheers for their entertainment, and the sponsors treat you well because it fills their coffers.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Think it through, look at all the difficulties you'll face, and only then should you press on. That's what makes a real knight.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I... I understand...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Yeah. I'm serious.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uncle's always said that even if we're stripped of our nobility and the family crest falls, it won't be the end of our lineage...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But I still want to protect everything that my sister and grandfather fought to defend.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret isn't here anymore, and as one of the youngest members of the Nearl family, I can't just stand by and watch my family fall from grace.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If I do that, I'll end up hating myself to death.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even when you know the path ahead will be ruthless and treacherous, you still embark on the journey. That's what it means to be a knight.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You can do it. This one's for you.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hear, hear. To Maria!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: (Holds mug up)
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*, I was hoping you people would help me talk her out of it. Turns out, you're encouraging her.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh... Zofia. Please, Auntie Zofia! Please, I beg you!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Stop it! Leave my age out of this! I'm only five years older than you!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Well, I'm part of the Nearl family. I know how you feel, but I still think—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'll work on my swordsmanship skills! I'll be good! Please, you can trust me!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh yeah! Why don't you be my coach—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Whoops—)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Now that reminds me. When was the last time we trained together?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Probably before Margaret left Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And what was the last technique I taught you? Where did it come from? How do you apply it in combat?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Uh... Hahaha... I-I wonder?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes, this is perfect.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We'll meet at the training grounds in the garden tomorrow morning. You won't be late, will you? Lady Maria, the Knightess?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hm? Y-Yeah... I'll be there.
attributes.name: Maria
